1.text: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made He him;

2.text: male and female created He them, and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

3.text: And Adam lived a hundred and thirty years, and begot a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth.

4.text: And the days of Adam after he begot Seth were eight hundred years; and he begot sons and daughters.

5.text: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years; and he died.

6.text: And Seth lived a hundred and five years, and begot Enosh.

7.text: And Seth lived after he begot Enosh eight hundred and seven years, and begot sons and daughters.

8.text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years; and he died.

9.text: And Enosh lived ninety years, and begot Kenan.

10.text: And Enosh lived after he begot Kenan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begot sons and daughters.

11.text: And all the days of Enosh were nine hundred and five years; and he died.

12.text: And Kenan lived seventy years, and begot Mahalalel.

13.text: And Kenan lived after he begot Mahalalel eight hundred and forty years, and begot sons and daughters.

14.text: And all the days of Kenan were nine hundred and ten years; and he died.

15.text: And Mahalalel lived sixty and five years, and begot Jared.

16.text: And Mahalalel lived after he begot Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begot sons and daughters.

17.text: And all the days of Mahalalel were eight hundred ninety and five years; and he died.

18.text: And Jared lived a hundred sixty and two years, and begot Enoch.

19.text: And Jared lived after he begot Enoch eight hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

20.text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years; and he died.

21.text: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begot Methuselah.

22.text: And Enoch walked with God after he begot Methuselah three hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

23.text: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years.

24.text: And Enoch walked with God, and he was not; for God took him.

25.text: And Methuselah lived a hundred eighty and seven years, and begot Lamech.

26.text: And Methuselah lived after he begot Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begot sons and daughters.

27.text: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years; and he died.

28.text: And Lamech lived a hundred eighty and two years, and begot a son.

29.text: And he called his name Noah, saying: ‘This same shall comfort us in our work and in the toil of our hands, which cometh from the ground which the LORD hath cursed.’

30.text: And Lamech lived after he begot Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begot sons and daughters.

31.text: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years; and he died.

32.text: And Noah was five hundred years old; and Noah begot Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
